Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver

[Groovy] Class BasePathResolver

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver.BasePathResolver
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      URIResolver

      @Log4j
@CompileStatic
class BasePathResolver
extends Object

      This resolver can be van take a base path and resolve relative URIs against it.

      Authors:
      cmahnke See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5416421/apache-fop-how-to-set-base-url-for-accessing-external-resource-using-relative-p
